stochastic_function: lambda study_decision: {1:0.7,0:0.3,-1:0.0} if study_decision == 'study more' else {1:0.3,0:0.5,-1:0.2}
lambda study_decision: {1:0.6,0:0.3,-1:0.1} if study_decision == 'study less' else {1:0.4,0:0.4,-1:0.2}

lambda current_knowledge, health_status, exam_difficulty: {1: round(0.7 - (1 - current_knowledge)*0.1 - (1 - health_status)*0.1 - (exam_difficulty +1)*0.1, 1), 0: round(0.9 - (0.7 - (1 - current_knowledge)*0.1 - (1 - health_status)*0.1 - (exam_difficulty +1)*0.1), 1), -1: 0.1}
